rows.label: qst201317_msg0001
rows.name: Um... Who's that boy?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0002
rows.name:
We found him being attacked by
a monster near Lake Varna, where
the kids apparently went.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0003
rows.name: Do you recognize him at all?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0004
rows.name:
No... I don't have any Luxurian
acquaintances.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0005
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201317_msg0006
rows.name:
D'you think this means the same
thing's happening over in Luxuria, too?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0007
rows.name: It's quite possible.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0008
rows.name:
And if so, this really is starting to sound
like some kind of kidnapping incident
rather than anything supernatural.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0018
rows.name:
You don't think my daughter may
have been kidnapped and taken to
a different country too?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0009
rows.name: It seems quite likely.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0010
rows.name: But what would someone do that for?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0011
rows.name: I can't begin to imagine.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0012
rows.name:
At any rate, this boy is the only
lead we currently have.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0013
rows.name:
Shall we take him home to Luxuria
and see what we can find there?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0014
rows.name:
Yes, let's see if we can find his
parents in Teos Aure.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0019
rows.name:
Are you gonna take me home?
You know where my mommy is?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0020
rows.name:
That's right. Let's go and look
for her together, shall we?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0015
rows.name: Uh-huh! Thanks, nice lady!

rows.label: qst201317_msg0016
rows.name:
Perhaps learning more about this boy's
situation will help us to find out what
happened to the other children.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0017
rows.name:
Dianna, I'm sorry, but could you
wait a little longer?

rows.label: qst201317_msg0021
rows.name:
Of course.
Please, do whatever you must.

rows.label: qst201317_msg0022
rows.name:
If this is an international incident,
there's not much we can do here but
wait and hope for good news.
